newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Apasco raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Apasco raised to buy.

text.p: Mexican brokerage Accival said on Monday it raised its recommendation on cement company Apasco to buy from neutral.

"Cement prices have stabilized, while the volume continues to grow. For this reason, we expect a rise in prices in the third quarter of the year, which will improve results in the second half," the brokerage said in a report.
The brokerage also cited the company's healthy financial situation, with high liquidity and low levels of leverage.
Accival said it set a year-end share price estimate for the company at 63 pesos.
Apasco's shares in Mexico stood at 56.50 pesos in late afternoon trading, up 70 centavos from Friday's close.
